description:
Businesses that partner with Google come in all shapes, sizes and market caps, and no one Google advertising solution works for all. Your knowledge of online media combined with your communication skills and analytical abilities shapes how new and existing business grow. Using your influencing and relationship-building skills, you provide Google-caliber client service, research and market analysis. You anticipate how decisions are made, persistently explore and uncover the business needs of Google's key clients and understand how our range of product offerings can grow their business. Working with them, you set the vision and the strategy for how their advertising can reach thousands of users.

In this role, you will join the Startups and Export Development (SEED) within Large Customer Sales (LCS) to build and manage a healthy pipeline of prospects across industries in Greece, Bulgaria, Cyprus, and Malta. You will leverage your experience in technology/sales and customer facing consulting to transform the start-up landscape and move the industry to a data driven, automated, and fully connected and cohesive marketing with Google solutions.

In this role you will educate and work with startups C-level managers to unlock their business' potential through Google solutions across multiple industries. You will identify opportunities for our customers and help bring them to a global market.

Our Large Customer Sales teams partner closely with many of the world’s biggest advertisers and agencies to develop digital solutions that build businesses and brands. We enjoy a bird’s eye view on the massive transformation occurring as advertising shifts to mobile and online platforms. We're uniquely situated to help shape how companies grow their businesses in the digital age. We advise clients on Google's broad range of products across search, video and mobile to help them connect instantly and seamlessly with their audiences.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • Ability to speak and write in Greek and English fluently and idiomatically.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in consultative sales and in client-facing roles, working with large clients, subject matter experts, and/or startups.
  • Ability to learn quickly and successfully manage advertiser and partner facing projects.
  • Ability adjusting styles and content in order to influence both executive decision makers and practitioners, demonstrating thought leadership.
  • Excellent analytical and business development skills.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills.
responsibilities:
• Identify players across industries, assess the opportunity, build C-level relations, and educate them on Google solutions. Build pipeline of tp prospects who can become global advertisers.
  • Build effective partnerships with Google’s top advertiser(s).
  • Know the competitive landscape and how to measure success and best speak to industry stakeholders and developers.
  • Grow effective internal network of stakeholders capable of supporting you with achieving goals.
  • Advocate technology and Exports by representing Google on events and fora with different incubators, private equity funds, and other startup partners.
title: SEED Manager (Greek and English)
